You will be my wife. Out of affection for you and in order to provide you with some property for your livelihood, I, without expecting any return from you, do hereby transfer to you the following property valued at Rs. 52,000-00 as per the schedule given above. I have inherited the Scheduled Property from my ancestors and I have made the following Scheduled Property available to you by this Settlement and have made it your possession this very day. From this date onwards, the right and responsibility over the Scheduled Property shall be yours, neither I nor my other heirs shall have any right whatsoever. From this date onwards, you shall pay the Government, Panchayat and other taxes on the Scheduled Property and shall have full authority to sell and dispose of it in perpetuity. I hereby resign and agree that Gangadhar 25th day of May, 2022 Endorsement: Signature of JOINT SUBREGISTRAR 215 Kalikiri 500 Layam $77324 * Desc In the Form of

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 984 of 2022, dated 25/May/2022, executed by Pasupuleti Gangadhara in favour of his Wife, Pasupuleti Gangadevi towards the property admeasuring an extent of 69.19 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 438/2, situated in Kalikirireddivarepalle Village, Kalikiri Grama Panchayath and Mandal, within the District of Annamayya, registered at sub-registrar office Kalikri(1003), is bounded as follows: North by: Road South by: Kaluva and Other's Property East by: House of Madhavi West by: House of Kumari Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.

1. The aforementioned P. Gangadhara and P. Gangadevi executed a Mortgage Deed on 14/ Jun/2022, registered as document No. 1110 of 2022, before the SRO Kalikri(1003), in favour of Veritas Finance Private Limited, towards the property measuring an extent of 69.19 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 438/2, situated in Kalikirireddivarepalle Village. Release Deed: The aforementioned Veritas Finance Private Limited executed a Release Deed on 27/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 150 of 2026, before the SRO Kalikri(1003), in favour of P. Gangadhara and P. Gangadevi, towards the property measuring an extent of 69.19 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 438/2, situated in Kalikirireddivarepalle Village. Note: Release Deed registered as document No. 150 of 2026, is not reflecting in online EC. Hence, it is advisable for the F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
